summary: Removed 3 malformed task objects from state.json (2 with null fields + T99 meta-task itself). State now contains exactly 3 valid tasks: WN-FIRE-004, WN-FIRE-006, WN-FIRE-007.
verification: Ran: jq '.tasks[] | select(.id == null)' .ralph/state.json → outputs nothing (no null ids)
Ran: jq '.tasks[].id' .ralph/state.json → outputs WN-FIRE-004, WN-FIRE-006, WN-FIRE-007
